quote: Fred Ruskin barreled through the rain down Buchanan Street in his battered Pacer, the jar his dead wife had directed him to retrieve from his nephewâ€™s coffin bouncing in the seat beside him.
quote_letters: FRED RUSKIN BARRELED THROUGH THE RAIN DOWN BUCHANAN STREET IN HIS BATTERED PACER THE JAR HIS DEAD WIFE HAD DIRECTED HIM TO RETRIEVE FROM HIS NEPHEWS COFFIN BOUNCING IN THE SEAT BESIDE HIM
